sentences.sContent: Note the wedge-shaped area of avascular necrosis (osteonecrosis) at the upper right of this femoral head.
sentences.sContent_eng: Note the wedge-shaped area of avascular necrosis (osteonecrosis) at the upper right of this femoral head.
sentences.sCn: 可见股骨头右上方楔形的缺血性坏死（骨坏死）区。

sentences.sContent: Anchiornis's wrist bone was so wedge-shaped that it could fold its arms to its sides, keeping its arm feathers off the ground as it walked.
sentences.sContent_eng: Anchiornis's wrist bone was so wedge-shaped that it could fold its arms to its sides, keeping its arm feathers off the ground as it walked.
sentences.sCn: 近鸟龙的腕骨呈深楔形，因此它可以将前肢折叠到身体两侧，行走时前肢上的羽毛可以悬空，不会拖在地面上。

sentences.sContent: I wish I could feed the fish, he thought. He is my brother. But I must kill him and keep strong to do it. Slowly and conscientiously he ate all of the wedge-shaped strips of fish.
sentences.sContent_eng: I wish I could feed the fish, he thought. He is my brother. But I must kill him and keep strong to do it. Slowly and conscientiously he ate all of the wedge-shaped strips of fish.
sentences.sCn: 我希望可以饲养这些鱼儿，他想著。他是我的兄弟。但是我必须杀掉他，还有保证强壮的身体来处理它。凭良心，他慢慢的吃掉了所有楔形的细长的鱼。
